short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension that extracts data from web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Canvas Grabber is a tool for recruitment consultants. It enables users to easily create candidate records in Canvas from web pages. It can also be used to run a search in Canvas to update existing records.

This extension currently supports the following sites:
 - Seek (Talent Search)
 - LinkedIn (Standard)
 - LinkedIn (Recruiter)

For more information on how to use this tool, click the information icon on the extension popup page.

This extension has the following requirements:
 - Canvas 11.40 (or higher)
 - Turn on the "Use Chrome Extension" permission in your user settings and restart Canvas.
